author: wtopstaff
title: Kings-Sharks Sums
text:
1 0—1 
First Period_1, Los Angeles, Toffoli 4 (Martinez, Carter), 11:37. 2, Los Angeles, Lucic 1 (Ehrhoff, Carter), 19:32 (pp). Penalties_Nolan, LA (roughing), 12:15; Lucic, LA (roughing), 16:12; Wingels, SJ (hooking), 18:30. 
Second Period_3, Los Angeles, Carter 1 (Doughty), 3:46. 4, San Jose, Ward 2 (Pavelski, Dillon), 15:06. Penalties_San Jose bench, served by M.Brown (too many men), 5:53; Wingels, SJ (hooking), 12:29; Martinez, LA (tripping), 12:56; McBain, LA (interference), 16:42; McNabb, LA (cross-checking), 18:09. 
Third Period_5, Los Angeles, Carter 2, 9:35 (pp). Penalties_M.Brown, SJ (interference), 9:33; D.Brown, LA (slashing), 11:15; Thornton, SJ (slashing), 11:15. 
Shots on Goal_Los Angeles 8-11-10_29. San Jose 18-12-10_40. 
Power-play opportunities_Los Angeles 2 of 4; San Jose 0 of 5. 
Goalies_Los Angeles, Enroth 1-0-0 (40 shots-39 saves). San Jose, Jones 4-2-0 (29-25). 
A_16,797 (17,562). T_2:39. 
Referees_Frederick L’Ecuyer, Dan O’Halloran. Linesmen_Darren Gibbs, Don Henderson. Topics:
